mapper.select: SELECT x.student_id, x.student_name, x.week_no, IFNULL(y.grade,0) as grade FROM ( SELECT sc.student_id, s.username AS student_name, week_no, h.id FROM student_class sc JOIN student s ON s.id = sc.student_id JOIN class c ON c.id = sc.class_id JOIN semester_class smc ON smc.class_id = c.id JOIN homework h ON h.semester_class_id = smc.id WHERE c.id = #{class_id} AND deadline < #{now} ) as x LEFT JOIN ( SELECT student_id, homework_id, grade FROM student_homework ) as y ON x.student_id = y.student_id AND x.id = y.homework_id ORDER BY x.student_id, x.week_no
